Detailed Description

This class holds the coordinates of those probes used by the GCAST algorithm.

bool CGRCFileWriter::Write ( bool  opposite = false  ) 

Writes the existing 1lq data to the grc file. This method requires that this class be populated with 1LQ File Data before it can be invoked (To poluate 1LQ file, you must first call PopulateData or Write(const affx1lq::C1LQFileData &libData,..) method).

Parameters:
opposite The generated GRC File contains the reverse direction.
Returns:
True if successful.
